lines.text: If you want, I'll fight you with one hand.
I'll fight you with none!
Um, look. Um, if you don't mind, I'd like to plan on remembering you two as if you were my kids. The kids I never had.

[Tony and Tia are filling out a questionnaire.]
Tony, what should I put after "sports"?
Put, "spectator."
I wonder... I wonder how I'd handle you kids if you were mine. Well, maybe that's why I never married, eh?
But Mr. O'Day. You were married.
What?
Long, long time ago. And she was so pretty. And you had a little house.
Yeah, I can see it. It was white, with yellow shutters. And there was a big elm branch over the whole roof.
Tony knows about people. He can see places they've been.

[Angry]
What else?

Well, your wife died only a few months after you were married. And you were so sad. You took an oath that you'd never give your love to another woman, or to anyone. And you never have.... I'm sorry, Mr. O'Day.
The name's Jason! If you know so dang much about me you might as well use it. Jason, you understand?
Tony, do you hear the dogs?
No. How far?
Oh, 20 miles.
Tony, we've got to get out of here, before it's too late, please.
Please, Mr. Bolt, you're too excited. You're going to make yourself sick.
You should go right to bed, Sir.
Tony, we've got to get out of here, please.
They *rode* out of here!
That thing's flying upside down... That's impossible! That kind of vehicle *can't* fly upside down. It's not supposed to fly at all!...
[Looks down sees the sky. Looks up and sees the ground]
They're not upside down, we are!
I should have known there was more than ESP to those two.
Look as far as you can see. Mr. Bolt owns everything in sight.
Well, I can see the sky.
I've got no patience for kids, especially runaways!
It's just the opposite sir, we're trying to find out where home is!
He just likes to yell a lot, he's not really that mean.
You've got to be kidding me.
Mr. O'Day, I think you bought too much.
Yeah, Winky can't drink four quarts of milk.
If you two weren't joshing me about Aristotle Bolt, we might be together for longer than I thought. He's a very powerful man, too pow...
[hears a siren, looks in the rear view mirror]
Motorcycle cop.
Will you get in trouble, Mr. O'Day?
It's not ME he's after.
You're nothing but a pair of undersized land pirates!
Chase them on a magic carpet if you have to!
I have found what you're looking for.
A camper van like that CAN'T fly upside down! Is isn't supposed to FLY at all!
